description: The underling of underlings. No other distinguishing characteristics.
name: Goomba

description: Goomba with wings. Can't reach it with a hammer while it's in the air, but once it's damaged, its wings get clipped. It's kind of sad really.
name: Paragoomba

description: A Goomba that wears a spiked helmet. Slighty higher attack power than a typical Goomba.
name: Spiked Goomba

description: When this hyperactive Goomba charges up, its Attack rises to eight, so watch yourself!
name: Hyper Goomba

description: When this winged Hyper Goomba charges up, its attack power rises to 8.
name: Hyper Paragoomba

description: When this hyperactive spike-headed Hyper Goomba charges up, its Attack rises to nine, so heads up!
name: Hyper Spiky Goomba

description: A Goomba that likes dark, damp places. It must look like that because it lives below ground.
name: Gloomba

description: A Gloomba with wings that may or may not get moldy.
name: Paragloomba

description: A Gloomba with a painful-looking spike that likes damp places.
name: Spiky Gloomba

description: Koopa Troopas have been around forever. Jump on them to flip them over and drop their defense to 0.
name: Koopa Troopa

description: A Koopa Troopa with wings that stays airborne until you stomp on it and send it plunging to the ground.
name: Paratroopa

description: A Koopa warrior that battles at the Glitz Pit in Glitzville. It may be a different color than your average Koopa, but its abilities are the same.
name: KP Koopa

description: A Koopa Paratroopa who's dyed its shell. Otherwise, it's the same as any other Paratroopa, which means one stomp and it loses its wings.
name: KP Paratroopa

description: When a Shady Koopa flips back up from its back, it attack increases. Shady Koopas have a place of honor in the Koopa family tree because of this distinction.
name: Shady Koopa

description: Other than having wings, this creature isn't very different from a Shady Koopa. Once it flips off its back, it boosts its attack.
name: Shady Paratroopa

description: A Koopa that prefers dark places. It has a very hard shell but you can flip it by jumping on it.
name: Dark Koopa

description: A Paratroopa that lives in dark, damp places. In has a very hard shell, but you can flip it over by jumping on it.
name: Dark Paratroopa

description: Occasionally uses an attack called Charge that saves up energy, and can call in backup for support if you don't defeat it quickly.
name: Koopatrol

description: A member of the elite forces of the Koopa clan. Its pair of red eyes is its most charming feature. After charging its attacks, it deals devastating blows, so watch yourself!
name: Dark Koopatrol

description: A Koopa Troopa that became a skeleton. It throws bones to attack and builds buddies to help it fight.
name: Dull Bones
